snippet.title: PETIT ISLAND LAUNCH TRAILER - EXPLORATION COZY GAME
snippet.description:
#cozygame #petitisland #cozygames 
Explore Petit Island: Have the cozy time of your exploration! Discover hidden treasures and wild animals on the island. Take photos, fishing, dig up... The villages and cities have so much to offer too in this cozy video game, so soak up all the knowledge while you can!

⚫Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1744970/Petit_Island/
🔴Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/petit-island-switch/
🔵PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011299
🟢Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/es-ES/games/store/petit-island/9NGRWWF4T5N2

00:00 - Welcome to Petit Island
00:23 - Catch bugs
00:29 - Fishing
00:33 - Take photos in Petit Island
00:40 - Dig up
00:45 - Get mounts
00:56 - Have fun helping your grandpaw

🐱Petit Island Physical Edition Release: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kg69h4XFC6k

Follow SOEDESCO®!
Discord: https://discord.gg/soedesco
Website: http://www.soedesco.com/
Newsletter: https://bit.ly/2wsfR4f
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Soedesco
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soedesco
Instagram: https://instagram.com/soedesco

Video editors: 
@DanielFigaresYT 
@juanfranrivero

About SOEDESCO:
SOEDESCO is an independent video game developer, publisher, and distributor founded in 2002 by Soedesh Chauthi with its headquarters in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, and offices in Madrid, Spain & Pilsen, Czech Republic. We deliver creative content across multiple genres and platforms for a worldwide audience in physical and digital formats.
